items.sentence: Here are some things that we need to consider.
Tom told me not to believe anything Mary said.
Who knew Tom would turn out to be such a jerk?
I can never tell Tom from his younger brother.
Do you have any more of the cheaper ones left?
When did she leave? Was it at four or five PM?
It's possible Tom came here when he was a boy.
It's possible Tom came here when he was young.
I didn't know Tom would have to do that today.
I didn't know that Tom didn't want to do that.
Tom just stood there with a smile on his face.
I'm not the one responsible for what happened.
I just hope that we make it out of here alive.
Recently, I've been eating three apples a day.
You look a lot like an old girlfriend of mine.
You look like you have something on your mind.
You look like you know how to handle yourself.
Ask me any question and I'll try to answer it.
We need to finish this project before October.
Please show me how to use the washing machine.
Keep your door closed and don't let anyone in.
Tom didn't go because Mary didn't want him to.
The police officer said we should go that way.
Tom lost his money, his family and his friends.
Tom loved writing poems when he was a teenager.
Tom made a loose translation from the original.
Tom managed to carry both suitcases by himself.
Tom managed to sell his car for a lot of money.
Did Tom, by any chance, let Mary drive the car?
Did that really cost you three hundred dollars?
Did you find any fingerprints on the wineglass?
Did you go anywhere during the summer vacation?
Did you have to get up very early this morning?
Do we need to watch out for tigers around here?
Do you want to go run around the track with me?
Does Tom earn enough money to live in the city?
Doing that sort of thing makes you look stupid.
Tom died three days after he arrived in Boston.
Tom does basically the same thing as Mary does.
It\'s quite clear to me that this is the truth.
It\'s very late, so I should already be in bed.
It\'s very unlikely that Tom wrote this report.
Let\'s ask Tom if he knows how to speak French.
Tom is only a few centimeters taller than Mary.
Tom is only just a little bit taller than Mary.
Tom is planning to stay here until next Monday.
Tom is ready to settle down and start a family.
Tom is saving his money up to start a business.
If you were in Tom\'s shoes, what would you do?
I\'ve made up my mind to ask Tom to forgive me.
